section.title: Agent management
section.para: In a typical OpenStack Networking deployment, some agents run on network or compute nodes, such as neutron-dhcp-agent, neutron-ovs-agent, and neutron-l3-agent. This extension enables administrators (enforced by the policy engine) to view status and update attributes for agents. Updating agent management API attributes affects operations of other components, such as OpenStack Networking schedulers. For example, administrators can disable a specified agent so that OpenStack Networking schedulers do not schedule resources to it.
For how to use agent management extension and OpenStack Networking schedulers feature, see the OpenStack Cloud Administrator Guide.

section.title: List agents

tr.td: Lists agents that report their status to OpenStack Networking server.

section.para: This operation does not require a request body.
This operation returns a response body. The default policy behavior is that non-admin user won't be able to see any agent in the response when this call is invoked

example.title: List agents: JSON request
example.programlisting: GET /v2.0/agents HTTP/1.1 Host: controlnode:9696 User-Agent: python-neutronclient Content-Type: application/json Accept: application/json X-Auth-Token: c52a1b304fec4ca0ac85dc1741eec6e2

section.title: Show agent details

tr.td: Shows details for a specified agent.

section.simpara: Error Response Codes:NotFound (404) if not authorized or the agent does not exist
section.para: This operation returns information for the given agent.
This operation does not require a request body.
This operation returns a response body. The body contents depend on the agent's type.

para.programlisting: GET /v2.0/agents/af4567ad-c2e6-4311-944d-22efc12f89af HTTP/1.1 Host: controlnode:9696 User-agent: python-neutronclient Content-Type: application/json Accept: application/json X-Auth-Token: a54d6fdda41341f892150e2aaf648f0d

section.title: Update agent

tr.td: Updates the admin status and description for a specified agent.

section.simpara: Error Response Codes: BadRequest (400) if something other than description or admin status is changed, NotFound (404) if not authorized or the agent does not exist
section.para: This operation updates the agent's admin status and description.
This operation requires a request body.
This operation returns a response body.

example.title: Update agent: JSON request
example.programlisting: PUT /v2.0/agents/af4567ad-c2e6-4311-944d-22efc12f89af HTTP/1.1 Host: controlnode:9696 User-Agent: python-neutronclient Content-Type: application/json Accept: application/json X-Auth-Token: 4cbb09e780434b249ff596d6979fd8fc Content-Length: 38

section.title: Delete agent
section.simpara: Error Response Codes: NotFound (404) if not authorized or the agent does not exist
section.para: This operation does not require a request body.
This operation does not return a response body.
